title: Horizons: The latest inspirational film from Cut Media
text: Submit Horizons: The latest inspirational film from Cut Media Sky 1 gave Cut Media the task to make a film about our bucket list if we had 34 days to live... Rather than thinking show more about death we decided that Hazel Findlay (who is one of the Worlds top rock climbers), and her father Steve epitomised living for today and are the exact reason why if you live every day to the full then you don't need a bucket list! show less Please log in to post a comment.
